summoned with #432 Summon Devata (Conjuration 8)

The Devata is a lesser god of the Celestial Sphere. Devatas once ruled parts of this world, but withdrew to the heavens ages ago. The Devata has a perfect body with four arms and blue skin. It is a powerful mage-priest and a formidable warrior. Devatas are sacred to the monkey people.
